W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
April 12, 195^
Mr. Frank E. Schooley, Treasurer
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Schooley:
In response to many requests received for inÂ¬
formation concerning the structure and activities
of the Foundation, a brief brochure "The W. K. Kellogg
Foundation" was recently issued.
It occurred to me that you might be interested
in seeing the brochure, a copy of which is enclosed.
Sincerely,
Robert VanDuyn
RVD/dr
